src:
Bagaimana Perasaan Jurgen Klopp Saat Melihat Liverpool Nyaris Kalah?
03 Nov 2019, 15:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Liverpool sekali lagi menuntaskan comeback dramatis untuk memetik kemenangan berikutnya di Premier League 2019/20. Kali ini Aston Villa yang jadi korban kekuatan dan kerja keras skuad The Reds.
Sabtu (2/11/2019) malam WIB, Liverpool membuktikan mentalitas mereka di Villa Park. Gol Mahmoud Hassan di menit ke-21 membuat tim asuhan Jurgen Klopp tertekan, bahkan terus berada dalam posisi sulit sampai akhir pertandingan.
Barulah di menit ke-87 Liverpool bisa bernapas lega usai gol penyeimbang Andrew Robertson. Tujuh menit kemudian, kelegaan itu berubah menjadi sorak gembira ketika Sadio Mane mencetak gol kemenangan tepat sebelum wasit meniup peluit panjang.
Pertandingan ini pasti terasa bak roller coaster bagi fans Liverpool, tapi bagaimana dengan Klopp? Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
How Does Jurgen Klopp Feel When Seeing Liverpool Almost Lose?
Nov 3 2019, 15:30 by Bola.net
Liverpool once more complete a dramatic comeback to reap the next victory in the 2019/20 Premier League. This time Aston Villa is a victim of strength and hard work of the Reds squad.
Saturday (11/02/2019) night WIB, Liverpool prove their mentality at Villa Park. Mahmoud Hassan's goal in the 21st minute put Jurgen Klopp's side under pressure, even in a difficult position until the end of the match.
It was only in the 87th minute that Liverpool could breathe a sigh of relief after Andrew Robertson's equalizer. Seven minutes later, the relief turned into joy when Sadio Mane scored the winning goal just before the referee blew the long whistle.
This match definitely feels like a roller coaster for Liverpool fans, but what about Klopp? Read below, Bolaneters!
